original_text: As Jesus was leaving the temple, one of his disciples said to him, “Look, Teacher! What massive stones! What magnificent buildings!”
korean_text: 예수께서 성전에서 나가실 때에 제자 중 하나가 이르되 선생님이여 보소서 이 돌들이 어떠하며 이 건물들이 어떠하니이까

sentences.original_text: As Jesus was leaving the temple
one of his disciples said to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자 중 한 사람이 그에게 말했습니다
